description: A former lieutenant of the 12th Division under captains Hikifune Kirio and Urahara Kisuke. She viewed Hikifune as a mother figure, and thus initially refused to accept Urahara as her replacement. Hiyori is a tiny, blonde-haired girl with a fierce temper and violent tendencies. Hiyori often abuses Hirako Shinji, usually by slapping him with one of her sandals or using him as a human shield when necessary.
name: Sarugaki Hiyori
